definition: to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)
to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret/to let the cat out of the bag

sentences.english: This guard circuit splits the leakage resistance into two parts.
sentences.chinese: 保护环将漏泄电阻分为了两个部分。

sentences.english: Leakage current is an error current that flows through insulators when a voltage is applied.
sentences.chinese: 漏泄电流是在施加电压时通过绝缘的误差电流。

sentences.english: Leakage current is another source of measurement interference that must be characterized.
sentences.chinese: 漏泄电流是另一种必须表征的测量干扰源。

sentences.english: Isolation is a measure of the leakage resistance between paths on the switch card.
sentences.chinese: 隔离是衡量开关卡上通路之间的漏泄电阻的一个指标。

sentences.english: Toilets are neat and clean , that flushes are working and no leaking and floor tiles are in good order.
sentences.chinese: 整洁干净，冲洗设备工作无漏泄，地板砖状况良好。

sentences.english: In parallel with the ideal switch is the contact leakage resistance and capacitance.
sentences.chinese: 与理想开关相并联的是触点漏泄电阻和电容。

sentences.english: The fourth section is about the auto test way and principle of the three thoroughfare valve leakage.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是三通阀漏泄自动检测方法与原理。

sentences.english: Leakage paths are the primary factor in limiting IR.
sentences.chinese: 漏泄通路是限制绝缘电阻的主要因素。

definition: airlock/air block/fipple (in the mouthpiece of wind instrument)
to inspect one by one/to list individually
confidential aspects of a matter/secrets/key moment for action
(literary) to cover/to conceal/to hide from view
to disobey and cause delays/to obstruct and procrastinate
